thread.title: Asian shares reverse gains as U.S. futures slip

title: Asian shares reverse gains as U.S. futures slip
text:
Asian shares reverse gains as U.S. futures slip 4:55am EST - 01:39 
Asian shares reversed their earlier gains on Wednesday as investors dumped U.S. stock futures for safer harbors, a sign investors remain jittery after this week's global markets rout. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
